seo.metaDescription: Learn what's being served up each day at your hometown Culver's.

fields.joinTheClubHeading: What flavor is next at your restaurant?
fields.joinTheClubCallout: Sign up for a Culver's account to get Flavor of the Day notifications, delicious offers, and other updates from this Culver's.

restaurantDetails.name: Culver's of Madison, WI - Todd Dr
restaurantDetails.ownerMessage:
Dining Room and Lobby are now OPEN to serve you with the added option of UberEats, DoorDash and Curdside delivery.  
Lobby Hours:  10:00 am to 11:00 pm
Drive Thru:  10 am to Midnight
DoorDash / UberEats:  10 am to Midnight

labels.value: MADISON - TODD DRIVE!! Thanks for your order!  We have 4 designated CurdSide Parking spots located by the FRONT DOOR of  the restaurant.  Park in the stall with the CurdSide.  Please, indicate online you have arrived or call 608-274-1221 when you arrive.
MADISON - TODD DRIVE!! Thanks for your order!  Once you walk inside the restaurant, please see cashier.
Drive thru to delicious! When you arrive, proceed to the drive thru and let our True Blue Crew know you've arrived.

restaurantDetails.customerFacingMessage:
MADISON - TODD DRIVE  
Your order is being placed at Culver's TODD DRIVE - MADISON, WI

flavors.description: Our delicious Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard explodes with OREO® Cookie pieces, chopped Dove® Chocolate pieces, mini M&Ms and streams of chocolate syrup.
flavors.name: Chocolate Volcano

flavors.description: Premium blend of cocoas for the ultimate chocolate experience.
flavors.name: Dark Chocolate Decadence

restaurant.title: Culver's of Madison, WI - Todd Dr

flavors.description: Chocolate and Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard swirled together with ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel and chopped Dove® Chocolate pieces.
flavors.title: Chocolate Caramel Twist

flavors.description: Our specially blended Mint Fresh Frozen Custard with OREO® Cookies for a refreshing treat.
flavors.title: Mint Cookie

flavors.description: Reese’s Peanut Butter Cups become a special treat when stirred in our delicious Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard.
flavors.title: Really Reese's

flavors.description: Our specially blended Peach Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with sweet peaches for a light, refreshing treat.
flavors.title: Georgia Peach

flavors.description: Culver’s Classic! Our creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel and loaded with lightly salted cashew pieces.
flavors.title: Caramel Cashew

flavors.description: Our delicious Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard explodes with OREO® Cookie pieces, chopped Dove® Chocolate pieces, mini M&Ms and streams of chocolate syrup.
flavors.title: Chocolate Volcano

flavors.description: Creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel, marshmallow creme, toasted pecan pieces and chopped Dove® Chocolate pieces.
flavors.title: Turtle Dove

flavors.description: Dark Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with a ribbon of peanut butter and crunchy Butterfinger pieces.
flavors.title: Dark Chocolate PB Crunch

flavors.description: Our creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard complemented with plump strawberries and novelty chocolate.
flavors.title: Chocolate Covered Strawberry

flavors.description: Chocolate and Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard swirled together with chewy pieces of Snickers.
flavors.title: Snickers Swirl

flavors.description: A rich, indulgent cookie dough treat with ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel and thick fudge swirled in creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard.
flavors.title: Caramel Fudge Cookie Dough

flavors.description: Our delicious Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard loaded with OREO® Cookies and streams of chocolate syrup.
flavors.title: OREO® Cookie Overload

flavors.description: Culver's Classic! This one still knocks our socks off. Specially blended Butter Pecan Fresh Frozen Custard with toasted pecan pieces.
flavors.title: Butter Pecan

flavors.description: Our specially blended Strawberry Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with plump strawberries.
flavors.title: Double Strawberry

flavors.description: A Culver's Classic! We begin with creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard and swirl in ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel, novelty chocolate, and toasted pecan pieces.
flavors.title: Turtle

flavors.description: Creamy Cheesecake Fresh Frozen Custard with rich cheesecake pieces and sweet raspberries for an indulgent treat.
flavors.title: Raspberry Cheesecake

flavors.description: Our creamy Vanilla and Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard swirled together and mixed with thick fudge, ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel and cookie dough pieces.
flavors.title: Crazy for Cookie Dough

flavors.description: Creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with ribbons of peanut butter and old fashioned salted caramel and loaded with novelty chocolate.
flavors.title: Caramel Peanut Buttercup

flavors.description: Andes Candies and novelty chocolate with our specially blended Mint Fresh Frozen Custard.
flavors.title: Andes Mint Avalanche

flavors.description: Our delicious Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard explodes with OREO® Cookie pieces, chopped Dove® Chocolate pieces, mini M&Ms and streams of chocolate syrup.
flavors.title: Chocolate Volcano

flavors.description: Premium blend of cocoas for the ultimate chocolate experience.
flavors.title: Dark Chocolate Decadence

flavors.description: Ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel swirled with our creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard and toasted pecan pieces. Taste why it's one of out most popular treats!
flavors.title: Caramel Pecan

flavors.description: Dark Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with chocolate cake and novelty chocolate.
flavors.title: Devil's Food Cake

flavors.description: Delicious Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard enhanced with ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel, toasted pecan pieces and chopped Dove® Chocolate pieces.
flavors.title: Caramel Chocolate Pecan

flavors.description: Creamy Cheesecake Fresh Frozen Custard with rich cheesecake pieces and OREO® Cookie pieces swirled in.
flavors.title: OREO® Cookie Cheesecake

flavors.description: Our delicious Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard with crunchy bits of Heath Bar. Kind of crunchy, kind of smooth, kind of incredible.
flavors.title: Chocolate Heath Crunch

soups.description: Hearty chicken broth combined with tender pieces of chicken, noodles and vegetables.
soups.title: Chicken Noodle Soup

soups.description: Many a cold winter day, Craig’s dad spent perfecting his now-signature creation—a hearty, medium-spicy chili con carne, made with simmered homestyle beef, diced tomatoes, dark red kidney beans, peppers, onion and celery, along with a secret blend of peppery spices.
soups.title: George's® Chili

soups.description: Many a cold winter day, Craig’s dad spent perfecting his now-signature creation—a hearty, medium-spicy chili con carne, made with simmered homestyle beef, diced tomatoes, dark red kidney beans, peppers, onion and celery, along with a secret blend of peppery spices, topped with sour cream, cheese, and onions.
soups.title: George's® Chili Supreme

soups.description: Many a cold winter day, Craig’s dad spent perfecting his now-signature creation—a hearty, medium-spicy chili con carne, made with simmered homestyle beef, diced tomatoes, dark red kidney beans, peppers, onion and celery, along with a secret blend of peppery spices.
soups.title: George's® Chili

soups.description: Many a cold winter day, Craig’s dad spent perfecting his now-signature creation—a hearty, medium-spicy chili con carne, made with simmered homestyle beef, diced tomatoes, dark red kidney beans, peppers, onion and celery, along with a secret blend of peppery spices, topped with sour cream, cheese, and onions.
soups.title: George's® Chili Supreme
